text:
The giant monster's body,
bisected by Hydoor's ultimately refined blade,
began to crumble into pieces.

A torrent of something, along with sparkling,
sand-like particles, gushed into the jet-black space.

Aiming for that jet-black space—
The group leaped out into outer space, guided by [Player]'s observation.

The surroundings were enveloped in darkness.
However, below them, there was indeed a vast space where the universe was exposed.
With no reference point, it was difficult to tell how far away it was, or how large it was.
—What was certain was that they could somehow take in its entirety within their sight.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
...It's incredible...
I can't see anything more than the bottom of the ocean.
This is a terrifying place...

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
—R-right! From here...!
What do we do from here!?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Well, [Player] closes the "rift",
and we return to our original universe, right?

name: Gnomon
text:
...I think the order should be reversed.
Everyone can remain in this space—

name: Gnomon
text:
Because my "magic" is forcibly securing a living space.
Outside this space is "nothingness" where even the concept of time does not exist...

name: Gnomon
text:
And my "magic"...
will probably become unusable the moment
the connection to the "Endangered World" is severed.

name: Gnomon
text:
...In other words,
it would be better to secure a way back to
your original universe before closing the "rift".

name: Barte
text:
B-But...!
Didn't we say [Player] had to find their original universe first?

name: Barte
text:
[Player]...
Do you have any clues?

[Player]—
looked at ID Replica, who was circling around them.

Something like a "chain" could be seen,
extending from [Player]'s body, in ID Replica's trajectory, stretching endlessly into the distance.
And ID Replica was constantly making a chirping sound.
The chirping sound could not be understood as language.

However, by its gestures and the signal echoing in their head...
[Player] understood.

options.text: ...Is it telling me to grab on?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—I see!
If this ID Replica is Exio's messenger...!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
I don't know who this Exio is, but at any rate,
this thing belongs to an acquaintance, right!?

name: Barte
text:
But... how do we grab onto this little guy?
Can all of us go?

name: Gnomon
text:
That... shouldn't be a problem.
In this space, the concept of weight also doesn't exist.

name: Gnomon
text: As long as [Player]-sama can grab onto that individual...

name: Gnomon
text:
If you all grab onto each other, connected to [Player]-sama,
I think you'll manage.

[Player] hesitantly reached out their hand
towards ID Replica's tail.

The tip of its white, snake-like body,
which looked like a shed skin—
was slowly gripped.
Hydoor's hand took [Player]'s hand, Barte's hand took Hydoor's hand—

Danzo's hand took Barte's hand.
They connected one after another.
And then...

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Alright, Gnomon-kun!
Your hand!

name: Gnomon
text:
...!
Yes!

This time, without hesitation.
Gnomon grasped Danzo's hand.
Danzo smiled slightly.

name: Gnomon
text:
—[Player]-sama!
Please close the "rift"!

While holding onto ID Replica—
[Player] focused on the "rift" in their sight.

To close the "rift"...
They began to observe.

...However.
That immensely vast path, with terrifyingly strong force,
resisted being closed.
The Ether pumps, released simultaneously with the monster's disintegration and scattered outside the path—

Even as they broke down,
they seemed to be generating gravity towards the "Endangered World" in an attempt to fulfill their function.

Perhaps influenced by this,
ID Replica struggled and writhed,
unable to move forward easily.

options.text: Damn it, I can't close it...!

name: Gnomon
text:
—This is bad.The cease command to the Ether pump...!
Connection timed out!

name: Gnomon
text:
Is it the effect of the Ether pump's bonds breaking...!?
Damn it, re-logging in, attempting... hurry!

Gnomon attempted to re-login to the Ether pump's administration screen.
The other members could only watch, holding their breath.

Amidst this, [Player] continued to observe...
but their spirit was gradually wearing down.

Their vision began to blur,
and their consciousness, little by little,
faded away.

—It was at that moment.
The terminal blared a deafening alarm.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—! What!?
What is that sound!?

name: Gnomon
text:
This is... a notification from the battle observation app!?
But, even outside the universe like this...!

The alarm continued to blare.
Their vision instantly cleared.
The sensation was just like...
The sensation was very similar to that time when "Observers" connected in parallel, strengthening each other's observation intensity.

At that moment, the terminal displayed the
received video feed in front of the group.

It was heavily distorted, and the audio was difficult to hear...
But it was unmistakably a communication from somewhere.

name: King
text:
—Hero—.
Please—our strength—
add to—it.

name: Magic Shop Owner
text:
I—was encouraged by—you—.
—The—power of each—person is weak but—

name: Guild Member
text:
—If we connect, surely—
—it will become a powerful force—
Therefore—

name: Village Elder
text:
—Save—the world!!
I'm counting on you!!

name: Gnomon
text:
H-His Majesty...!?
And—

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text: Aren't those the guys we met all over the place?!

name: Barte
text:
I see some familiar faces, that guy was definitely an "Observer"!
So then...!

name: Gnomon
text: ...Are the "Observers" of that world all observing the exposed "rift" together...!?

name: Gnomon
text:
But, the "Observers" of the "Endangered World" all had weakened power...
So why...?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—It might be like the "three arrows" story.
Even if each one is weak alone, if they're bundled together, they become strong enough.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Over a trillion people watched that battle.
If all the "Observers" among them are watching the current sky and observing—

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
What do you think would happen if they were properly and
firmly bundled together with [Player] as the band leader...!?

options.text: It would be an incredible observational ability!

text:
[Player] steadied their breath.
Once again, they began to close the "rift".

The "rift," which had been repelling with tremendous force,
rapidly narrowed in size.

The hole became the size of a speck in their vision.
At the same time—
ID Replica began to move with great vigor.

The pea-sized world, whether it was moving away or shrinking,
was indistinguishable, but it was gradually becoming invisible.

name: Barte
text:
...Thanks, everyone.
Take care...

They were already beginning to lose sight of each other.
However, Barte certainly bid them farewell.
As it entered Gnomon's ears, various images instantly replayed in his mind.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
—Gnomon.
You must have felt lonely, didn't you?
But... it's alright now.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
I'll be taking care of you from now on.
You could say I'm your master.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
...Well. You can think of me like a parent.
Nice to meet you.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
Hmm... Gnomon.
You tend to be too afraid of everyone else besides me.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
It's alright. Outsiders aren't as cold to you as you fear.
So... relax.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
...You've really come into your own.
I've grown quite old too.
Perhaps it's time for you to take over.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
—Just kidding.
Hahahaha, don't look like you're about to cry.
I'm not going yet.

Those were memories of the "Endangered World",
spent with his late master.
And...

name: King
text:
...The previous Lord Korphen was indeed a magnificent "Great Wizard".
Truly... a regrettable loss.

name: King
text:
However... if you are here, having surely inherited his will, then I am at ease.
Fulfill the mission entrusted to you... without fail.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
With your wisdom—
You will surely be able to live strongly, no matter what choice you make.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
So...
Even if you go to a different world, you'll surely be fine.
Live well.

name: Gnomon
text:
Ah... Ah...
Ahhh...!

His eyes blurred, and tears overflowed.
Gnomon cried out his master's name.
However—

Before that sound could fully resonate—
The "rift" closed.
And nothingness enveloped everything.

—The "Broker" released his hand from the
glowing orb he had been holding, and let out a sigh.

name: Mysterious Man
text:
...Honestly.
As expected, a warning is necessary.

name: Mysterious Man
text:
Even though it had been almost like squeezed pulp,
and I had squeezed the production and collection cycle to its minimum—

name: Mysterious Man
text:
They led such a universe back to recovery.
That's commendable... but, it shouldn't have been left unchecked.

name: Mysterious Man
text: They don't seem to understand their own preciousness at all...

The "Broker" pondered for a moment, then began to call someone.
However, the other party showed no sign of responding.

name: Mysterious Man
text:
.........
What method did they use?

name: Mysterious Man
text:
Without my intervention...
How did they outsmart the surveillance of "that monster"?

name: Mysterious Man
text:
...Did they use the "barrier" I prepared?
Or...

name: Mysterious Man
text:
...Either way, it's utterly cunning.
As expected, you are... well worth observing.
Final Chapter - The One Who Regenerates the World

name: Announcer
text:
—We repeat, for your information.
This event has been canceled due to a disaster caused by Ether turbulence.

name: Announcer
text:
Please confirm your personal safety and promptly exit the venue,
following the instructions of the guides.
For ticket refunds...

name: Rutilix
text:
—Your Majesty!
Due to the emergency, I apologize for transmitting the report from the Cavalry Captain via communication!

name: Rutilix
text:
All divisions, all personnel and draconic riders have been confirmed safe.
Only a few individuals sustained minor injuries.

name: Alphecca
text:
—Hmm. Good work on the transmission, Rutilix.
...With this, all safety reports are in.

name: Alphecca
text:
It seems fortunate that the opened path was facing the stadium.
It's most important that there were no casualties among the spectators.

name: Rutilix
text:
...Yes.
But...

King Alphecca of the Aradisia Kingdom surveyed the venue,
where most of the audience had already left, leaving only the heroes and staff.

Although the temporary stadium's upper tiers of seating were mostly undamaged,
the stage where the heroes and knights had stood was—

Destroyed as if scooped out from its center,
having been drawn into the path that appeared for approximately one minute.

Alphecca averted his gaze from that section,
which had become a pile of rubble with exposed steel frames.

name: Alphecca
text: In the end... the only casualties were [Player] and two heroes who went missing, huh.

name: Rutilix
text:
...My lord,
I can't believe that person
would be caught in such an accident.

name: Huckle
text:
...I am deeply sorry.
It was due to our company's operator
intervening in the observation at that location.

name: Alphecca
text:
—No. There is no need for you to apologize.
Ether turbulence is a natural disaster in the first place; no one is to blame.

name: Alphecca
text:
...Moreover.
The operators of each company and our country's wizard corps all agree.

name: Alphecca
text:
Anyone in such a situation would instinctively
take actions like [Player]... so they say.

name: Alphecca
text:
In other words...
[Player] acted correctly as an operator.
That should rather be praised.
Alphecca said that, then lowered his eyebrows and sighed.

name: Alphecca
text:
...I understand your worries all too well.
To think that [Player]... would go missing.

name: Huckle
text:
.........
Yes... I've also contacted experts in various fields...

name: reXer
text:
...[Player], Danzo.
There's no way they won't come back, right...?

name: Polaris Mask
text:
Hey, don't say ominous things!
It's [Player], you know?
They'll surely find a way to come back!

name: Polaris Mask
text:
...Hydoor's a tough guy too!
There's no way he'd just disappear and be done with it.

name: Ryekie
text:
...I share the same desire to believe.
We know the strength of those three.
They will surely return safely.

name: Ryekie
text:
Has it really only been an hour...
since then?
It feels so long.

Disregarding the anxious heroes, Exio remained silent,
simply staring intently at the sky.

Occasionally, furrowing his brow,
as if concentrating on something.

name: Melide
text:
.........
Exio-sama...
Did you see something...?

name: Exio
text:
.........
—They're coming.

name: Melide
text:
Eh... "Coming"?
What on earth—...?!
This fluctuation of Ether...!

name: Ryekie
text:
What's wrong, both of you!?
Could it be...!!!

name: Melide
text:
—I don't know.
I don't know, but...
A path is about to open...!

Before they knew it, their eyelids had closed.
[Player] slowly opened their eyes.
Then—
[Player]'s body was in the clear blue sky.

To their right was Danzo, holding them.
Looking around from that point...

name: Danzo
text:
—Oh, come on.
This development again...?

A sky crisscrossed by many bands of light—satellite bands.
A desolate plain, and the distant royal castle.

[Player] and the others were...
falling from the sky above a place that seemed to be the Aradisia Kingdom.

options.text: Whoa, whoa, we're falling, we're falling!!
I wonder if we made it back!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I don't know, but...!
Anyway, why are we in the sky again?!

name: Danzo
text:
—That's right, everyone!
What about everyone else who was with us...!?

name: Hydoor
text:
A-ahhhhhhh!?!
Why is it like this again!?!
H-Help meee!!

Looking towards the voice,
they saw Hydoor desperately clinging to
Danzo's right leg with only his grip strength.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Damn it...!
You, I'm really gonna hit you a few times later...!

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, he's there again.
Well, Hydoor's fine.
And the others...

name: Gnomon
text:
Whoaaaaaaaah!!!
We're... falling!!!

name: Barte
text:
Whoaaaaaaaaah!!!
This is bad, this is bad, this is bad!!
Help meee!!

Hanging below Hydoor...
Gnomon and Barte.
Their respective figures were there.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey...!
You guys are heavy!!
My body's going to tear apart...!?

name: Hydoor
text:
Gnomon!
You, what about your so beloved "magic"!?
You can fly, can't you!?

name: Gnomon
text:
B-Because...
I'm trying, but!
I can't use "magic"!

name: Gnomon
text:
I can't connect to the "grimoire"...
F-First, I need to calm down.
If this continues, it will truly be over.
We'll just die.

name: Barte
text:
You're kidding me?!
After all the trouble of flying across worlds again,
is this the end for us?!

name: Danzo
text:
Alright, alright! Geez, fine!
Everyone, climb up my body!
Starting from Barte-chan at the very bottom!

name: Barte
text:
O-oh...!
Danzo, you have a plan, don't you!?
As expected...!!

name: Danzo
text:
Nope, not at all.
Just that I'm used to high-altitude landings, so there's a slim chance.

name: Gnomon
text:
A slim chance, you say...!?
Have you ever landed while carrying this many people!?

name: Danzo
text:
Eh, absolutely zero.
Actually, it's probably over capacity.

name: Hydoor
text:
You idiot, be dependable until the very end, don't mess around!
Damn it... I'm really counting on you!!

[Player] held in front of him, Barte on his right shoulder, Gnomon on his left shoulder.
And Hydoor on his back.

Danzo descended while carrying four people.
The scenery on the ground gradually approached.

It was a wasteland—
right nearby, there was a familiar stadium,
clearly temporary at a glance.

name: Danzo
text:
—Alright, time to land, ladies and gentlemen!
Brace for impact!!

—A few moments after the call.
Danzo landed on the ground with a sound like a bomb exploding.

I involuntarily closed my eyes from the rising dust
and the impact reverberating through my arms.
Then, slowly, as I opened my eyes...

name: Danzo
text:
...Ah, yeah, I give up.
Sorry, but I can't do this anymore.

name: Everyone
text: Whoa—!?

As Danzo lost his balance, he collapsed in a heap.
The five of them tumbled over, tangled together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Y-Yeah, I'm fine... no worries.
But I guess I found out that even I'm not built to carry four people.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I don't know.
At least, "magic"
doesn't seem to be usable.

name: Barte
text:
Those bands in the sky... I've seen them before.
I just can't remember the name...

name: Hydoor
text:
Satellite bands...
It was common in the world we came from...

—No doubt about it!
It's [Player] and the others!!

Heeeyyyy!!!
Are you alright!!!!?

Many voices, footsteps.
Gradually getting closer.
They were all familiar voices.

And the people who appeared from beyond the wilderness—
Surrounded [Player] and the others.

options.text: They called my name, that means...!

name: Ryekie
text:
Whoaahhh!!
I'm so glad you're safe!!!
I was worried about you, [Player]!!!!

Before everyone else could gather,
Ryekie lifted [Player] up and hugged them tightly.

options.text: This feeling of happiness... it's definitely real.

name: Polaris Mask
text:
You, Justice!
That's sly!! ...No,
this isn't the time to be saying that!

name: Polaris Mask
text:
I believed you guys weren't the kind to die so easily...
And sure enough! Heheh.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Hah, of course.
You can't underestimate our tenacity.

name: reXer
text:
Seriously, I was worried!
No one knew if you'd be able to come back or not...!

name: Danzo
text:
Ah-ah, come on, reXer-chan!
Wipe your tears, you're ruining your handsome face!
...Sorry for making you worry, I'm home.

name: Huckle
text:
—Ryekie.
Shouldn't you let go soon?
[Player] also looks uncomfortable.

name: Ryekie
text:
Ah, ah, my apologies!!
My emotions got the better of me, I just...!

Released by Ryekie and set down,
before them stood the Parallel Flight Inc.'s
Aradisia expedition team.

name: Huckle
text:
...Welcome back. It must have been very difficult,
but I'm glad you found a way to return.

name: Melide
text:
Seriously... I was so worried.
I kept thinking, if only I had done things properly,
this wouldn't have happened...

options.text: I apologize for making you worry, President.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, it couldn't be helped.
It's not something you should apologize for at all.

options.text: Melide, I'm sorry for making you anxious.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Melide
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No... it's okay.
[Player] is back, so I'm happy right now...

name: Melide
text:
—Exio-sama, you see.
He went to search, thinking he might be able to find them...

name: Melide
text:
And then, Exio-sama also stopped saying anything.
I wondered what would happen.

options.text: Thank you for coming to meet us.

text: Exio sighed deeply and grumbled discontentedly.

name: Exio
text:
You are my "anchor",
so what do I do when you disappear from this world?
I'm at a loss to understand.

name: Exio
text:
...It seems I need to teach you about
path control once again.

options.text: Couldn't you be a little kinder!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Exio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Oh, was that necessary?
But, yes. You must be quite exhausted.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Exio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I suppose I can offer a free treatment as a token of appreciation.
...Just this once, as a special favor.

options.text: Ah, so that's why it looked like a "chain".

name: Barte
text:
...Hey, Gnomon.
What should I do, I can't understand
anything they're saying over here...?

name: Gnomon
text:
Ah... was it the same for you, Barte-sama...?
It's no wonder, given how long you've been living over there.

name: Gnomon
text:
The translation function—seems to be working.
This app was standalone, it seems...
That's good.

name: Barte
text:
Oh, so it seems like we can manage somehow...!?
Help me adjust it, I'm really in trouble like this!

While [Player], Danzo, and Hydoor were surrounded,
the two of them whispered, operating their mobile devices.

name: Huckle
text:
Oh, by the way...
[Player]-kun.
Who are these two?

name: Huckle
text:
I was told that only... the three of you
were missing, wasn't I?

options.text: Ah, no, well, a lot happened...

text:
Just as [Player] was about to introduce the two,
more people appeared with shouts.

name: Alphecca
text:
—Oh, [Player]!
And you, Heroes!
Well done on your return!

name: Rutilix
text:
I was wondering what would happen,
[Player]-dono! Your safe return
is truly a blessing!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alphecca
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...No, it's nothing for you to worry about.
It was all an accident caused by a natural disaster.
Your return, above all else, is the greatest fortune.

name: Huckle
text:
Your Majesty...!?
Are your duties already finished?
Weren't you detained by the Minister earlier?

name: Alphecca
text:
Ah, it's fine. I obtained permission.
The senior cavalryman who rushed out first—

name: Alphecca
text: Because I had a reason to bring this Rutilix back.

name: Rutilix
text:
Y-Your Majesty!?
Did you use me as an excuse again!?
Oh, I'm afraid to go back...!

name: Polaris Mask
text:
Hahaha! That's good,
that reckless impulsiveness of yours!
It reminds me of when I was a kid, I like it!

name: Polaris Mask
text:
Hey, are you interested in mixed martial arts?
With that youth and guts, and extraordinary durability!
I think you could aim for the top even now!

name: Rutilix
text:
W-What are you saying!?
I take pride in being a knight,
I have no intention of considering another path!

name: Rutilix
text:
This Rutilix Sol Korphen!
Until I become a splendid knight, I will single-mindedly
advance along the path of knighthood!!

name: Gnomon
text:
...Eh?
Kor... phen...?

Gnomon, who had been adjusting the translation language while holding his hand to his ear,
had just finished adjusting it when—

His eyes widened at the name of the lion before him,
which had just reached his ears.

name: Rutilix
text:
—Hm, [Player]-dono?
And this person? From what I see,
they appear to be a lion as well...

name: Gnomon
text:
...Not just the family name.
That fur, those patterns...
He's young, but... could it be...

—A few days after the commotion on Planet Endaira.
Planet Garunderra.
In front of a blacksmith's workshop in a village at the foot of a mine...

Ganran, the master of the workshop—
stood motionless, as if speechless.

His disciple, standing before him—
looked away and fell silent.

A strangely awkward atmosphere.
The group accompanying this reunion
involuntarily fell silent.

options.text: It's supposed to be a miraculous reunion...

name: Barte
text:
.........
A-about that...

—At that moment.
Ganran's hand, which had finally opened his mouth,
began to tremble.

name: Ganran
text:
Where in the world have you been,
you idiotic apprentice!!

name: Barte
text:
—What?!
Huh!?

name: Ganran
text:
You just vanished into thin air,
and now you're back with such a fuss,
involving all these people!!

name: Ganran
text:
Iron Law, number one!!
Wipe your own ass!!

name: Ganran
text:
If you're going to call yourself my apprentice,
you should naturally uphold it, shouldn't you?!
Don't you dare say you forgot!!

name: Barte
text:
...! Is that the first thing you're going to say?!
It's not like I wanted to be sent to another world!

name: Barte
text:
I didn't know how to get back,
or what to say when I returned, I didn't know anything!

name: Barte
text:
You don't even understand that!?
That's what happens when you're so rigid with your "rules", "rules"!

name: Ganran
text:
Huh!? She said it!
An apprentice acting all high and mighty!!

Shouts exchanged between master and disciple.
The atmosphere was filled with hostility as they hurled sharp words at each other.

name: reXer
text:
H-Hey, hey!?
Why is the mood like this!?
Ganran-san...!?

name: Gnomon
text:
Um... don't you think we should stop them?
It's such a rare reunion...

options.text: Hey, both of you, that's enough—

name: Hydoor
text:
Let them be.
That's how those kinds of people are,
they won't be satisfied until they've said everything they want to say.

name: Danzo
text:
Exactly.
If they argue for a while, it'll naturally...
—See?

At that moment, Ganran,
who had been continuously hurling insults,
hugged Barte tightly.

name: Ganran
text:
.........
You really made me worry.
...I'm glad you came back.
Ganran smiled, with tears welling in his eyes, at an angle that Barte couldn't quite see.

name: Barte
text:
Ga-Ganran...
...Ah, ah...!
I'm home...!

Barte, too—
smiled with tears in her eyes and hugged him back.

name: Huckle
text:
...That's good.
It was worth the long journey.

options.text: I'm glad we could reunite them.
I'm about to cry from this too.

name: Danzo
text:
...This also seems to be
another case closed, huh?
Glad to hear it.

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, well... I'll have to go pay a visit
to that grumpy face tomorrow.
His words were already prickly on the phone.

name: Huckle
text:
Even so...
Tenma-sensei was, after all,
worried about you, wasn't he?

name: Danzo
text:
...I knooow.
It's precisely because that Master
requested it that I'm here now, you see.

name: Hydoor
text:
...I guess I'll go visit the prison sometimes.
I haven't seen the boss' face in a long time.

name: Hydoor
text:
And while I'm at it... the grumpy faces
of my clan, too.

options.text: You do care about them, after all.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My pirate comrades, that is!
...As for my clan, that's just
a side trip, a side trip.

options.text: It was thanks to your pirate days that you could transform.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Yeah. I was reminded anew that
those people made me who I am today.

options.text: Give my regards to the boss.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, what should I even tell him?
You don't even know him... Well.
I'll tell him you said hello.

name: Gnomon
text:
...It's truly good that everyone
could return to where they belong.

options.text: Gnomon, what are you going to do?
As expected... you probably can't go home.

name: Gnomon
text:
...For a while, I've decided to
be taken care of in the Aradisia Kingdom
of this world.

name: Gnomon
text:
The "King" here—Alphecca-sama, was very interested
in my background and "magic", so I humbly accepted his offer.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Furthermore, the Korphen family of this world
also insisted that I live with them.

name: Gnomon
text:
So I'll be staying as a guest until I save up some money...
Rutilix-sama was quite confused, though.

name: Rutilix
text:
Wh-What's going on...!?
Our family, a long line of knights, and now a mage?
Me... resembling your uncle... huh!?

options.text: You won't have to worry about food, clothing, or shelter then.
It's okay to rely on your "uncle."

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No... although I called him that then,
I heard his name is different and he's younger than me.
Ultimately, I don't know...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...But, he is still a relative, and it's a good connection.
I intend to do my best to repay him.

name: Huckle
text:
I see... His Majesty would certainly be
very interested in someone with your special skills.
I'm relieved.

name: Huckle
text:
However, if I recall correctly...
You can no longer use "magic", can you?

name: Gnomon
text:
...I investigated thoroughly, and it's more accurate to say that I can "mostly" no longer use it.
Since I can no longer connect to the database...

name: Gnomon
text:
The small amount remaining in my memory.
Roughly 0.4% of the total. That is the "magic" I can currently use.

options.text: So you can still use a little, at least.

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes. Even so... the things I can use
seem to be only those that can be achieved with
very common technology in this world.

name: Hydoor
text:
Won't that be pretty inconvenient?
After all, you've relied on it to live, haven't you?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Certainly, it might be inconvenient for a while.
However, I came to this world of my own free will.

name: Gnomon
text:
To find things that can be utilized as "magic" from developing science,
and to build the "grimoire" myself—

name: Gnomon
text:
I think living such a life might be enjoyable.
So... I'll be fine.

name: Hydoor
text:
...I see.
Well, your life is your own.
If you can enjoy it, that's all that matters.

name: reXer
text:
...However. Now that it's over,
I can say this. As a gamer,
I'm a little envious.

name: reXer
text:
Appointed as a "Hero", forming a party with mages and warriors,
a grand adventure to save the world, right?

name: reXer
text:
It's seriously a classic fantasy world.
It's something you rarely get to experience, you know?

options.text: So, reXer, want to go next?

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh...!?
N-No, I'm good!!
That kind of thing is only for games!!

options.text: It was really tough, you know!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-I know!!
That's why I said
"now that it's over"!!

options.text: Now that you mention it, it was an amazing experience.

name: Danzo
text:
Haha. Now, it's just a good story to tell!
Well then... let's go home too.

name: Hydoor
text:
Yeah...
To the place where the people waiting for us
are.

Having witnessed the regeneration of one bond,
each person returned to their own place,
bound by their own bonds.

Even if it meant crossing universes,
with the strong bonds that were never broken
as their guiding light.

—The "Formerly Endangered World".
A world under reconstruction, having escaped the crisis of destruction,
and now enjoying peace.

The remnants of the Ether pump,
which had extensively collapsed and would never recombine, occasionally rained down on the planet as shooting stars.

name: Traveler
text:
Fufufufu~n,
Fuhfuhfuh~n!

A traveler journeying across a certain plateau
on Planet Endaira
hummed a cheerful tune.

It was—a song left behind by the Heroes
who saved this world during their journey.

A piece of a legend that would be sung for a long time—
in praise of the heroes who saved the world.

Live A Hero! Special Edition
"World End Travelers"
— END
